decision_conditions: The application seeks approval of the detail required by Condition 6 (3G pitch details) of planning permission 23/01733/FUL  (Development of full sized all weather football pitch and 6 padel tennis courts with associated means of enclosure including fencing and netting,  8m high 12nos floodlighting, 15m high 8nos floodlights and associated works.Condition 6 was requested by Sports England  and requires full details of the design and layout of the 3G Artificial Grass Pitch  prior to construction in order to ensure that the development is fit for purpose and sustainable . The applicant submitted the following documents :Site location plan Drawing Number 20-008 Rev D0Site Plan Layout  Sheet No 001 Rev 02Kerb Layout  Sheet No 002 Rev 02Fence Layout  Sheet No 003 Rev 02Proposed All Weather Pitch Plan  Drawing Number 20-003 D1Proposed Site Plan Drawing No 20-005 Rev D2CC Grass Pride 50-13 Technical DataTechnical Specification for Shock Pad T251KSports England provided comments from the Football Foundation on behalf of the FA:'There  are no details in terms of infill migration within the plans, we would expect to see fitting containment barriers on a pitch's perimeter fencing. Installation of decontamination grates and boot cleaning brushes  at all player and  vehicle entrance gates. Ensuring all stormwater drains around the pitch have suitable microfilters to capture  any infill being carried by surface water run off. Attached is the EN Guidance FF adopted in 2020 for all our funded artificial pitches and it can also be located here https://www.estc.info/wp-content/uploads/2020/03/FprCENTR-17519-Public.pdf  Applicants should  refer to the guidance when proposing infill retention  and mitigation measures in their 3G pitch designs. In addition to this, there are new details regarding this floodlight specification.'In light of the comments above,  Officers would recommend  the Football Foundation comments are thoroughly reviewed  prior to any future application being submitted to discharge  Condition 6.Officers conclude the details submitted to discharge Condition 6 ( 3G Pitch details)  of planning permission 23/01733/FUL are unacceptable.
